testcase.classname: Feature to test the add, edit and delete options for the user
testcase.name: Verify the add user functionality - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given the user logins the page with valid credentials.......................passed Given the user is in user management page...................................passed When the user clicks on Add button..........................................passed Then the user is in Add User Page...........................................passed When user adds with parameters "Admin", "Enabled", "Virat Kohli", "Virat Kohli", "Bala@123", "Bala@123".passed And the user clicks on Save button..........................................passed Then the user with "Virat Kohli" should be saved and added to the records...passed
